exercises.dragDropStep4: Optional: Add an explanation that will be displayed after answering

home.pagetitle: Linguami - Learn Russian & French Online | Interactive Courses & Exercises
home.description: Learn Russian and French with Linguami: interactive courses, authentic videos, audio content, exercises, and personal dictionary with spaced repetition. Immersive method for rapid progress.
home.keywords: learn russian online, learn french online, language learning platform, russian courses, french courses, interactive language learning, spaced repetition, vocabulary builder
home.title: much more than a language site
home.subtitle: Learn a modern language spoken by native speakers. Discover a culture and join a community based on mutual aid and friendship between peoples
home.subtitleMobile: Learn a modern language spoken by native speakers.
home.videosubtitle: Movie clips, trailers, music videos - learn while having fun
home.audiosubtitle: Dialogues, audiobooks, podcasts - work on your listening comprehension wherever you are
home.textsubtitle: Myths, legends, culture - improve your level while traveling
home.dictionarysubtitle: Keep all your words in a personal dictionary
home.flashcardssubtitle: Review your vocabulary with our flashcard system
home.translatorsubtitle: Sign up and translate any word from any text
home.teachersubtitle: Take remote classes with a certified teacher and benefit from personalized learning
home.giftranslatorsubtitle: Add translated words to your personal dictionary
home.gifflashcardssubtitle: Easily remember words added to your dictionary with our review tool
home.discoverResources: Discover all our resources to learn effectively
home.learning_tools_subtitle: Discover our interactive tools designed to enrich your learning experience
home.features_subtitle: A complete platform to master a new language
home.how_it_works_subtitle: Three simple steps to start your adventure
home.step1_desc: Select the language you want to master and set your personal goals
home.step2_desc: Dive into our authentic videos, texts and dialogues with integrated translation
home.step3_desc: Review with flashcards, track your stats and unlock new levels
home.popular_subtitle: Start with our most appreciated resources
home.faq1_a: Linguami offers authentic immersion through real content: videos, texts and everyday dialogues. Our approach favors understanding in context rather than rote learning.
home.faq2_q: What level do I need to start?
home.faq2_a: No prerequisites! Our content is adapted to all levels, from complete beginner to advanced.
home.faq3_q: How does the translation system work?
home.faq3_a: Click on any word in our texts to get an instant translation. The word is automatically added to your personal dictionary so you can review it later with our flashcards.
home.faq4_q: How does the personal dictionary work?
home.faq4_a: All words you translate are saved in your dictionary. You can organize them, review them with the spaced repetition system, and track your progress.
home.faq5_a: Earn XP as you learn, level up, unlock badges and climb the leaderboard. Our gamification system turns your learning into a motivating adventure.
home.final_cta_subtitle: Join Linguami and start learning now.

privacy.page_description: Privacy policy and personal data protection of Linguami. GDPR compliant.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use and protect your personal data
privacy.intro: At Linguami, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union.
privacy.section_1_content:
We collect the following information when you use Linguami:

**Account Information:**
- Username (nickname)
- Email address
- Profile picture (if you log in via Google, Facebook or Apple)
- Spoken language and learning language
- Language level

**Usage Data:**
- Progress in lessons and exercises
- Words added to your personal dictionary
- XP points, level and learning statistics
- Time spent on the platform

**Technical Data:**
- IP address
- Browser type and device
- Session cookies
privacy.section_2_content:
We use your data to:

- **Provide the service**: Manage your account, save your progress
- **Improve the experience**: Personalize your learning journey
- **Communicate**: Send important notifications (email validation, password reset)
- **Security**: Protect your account and prevent fraud
- **Development**: Improve our features and fix bugs

We **never sell** your personal data to third parties.
privacy.section_3_content:
If you log in via Google, Facebook or Apple:

- We only receive your **name**, **email** and **profile picture**
- We **never** access your Google/Facebook/Apple account
- You can revoke access at any time in your third-party account settings
- **Facebook only**: If you revoke access via Facebook, your data will be automatically and permanently deleted from Linguami in compliance with GDPR
- These services have their own privacy policies that we encourage you to review
privacy.section_4_content:
Your data is:

- **Encrypted** during transfer (HTTPS/SSL)
- **Stored** on secure servers (Supabase - AWS infrastructure)
- **Protected** by hashed passwords (bcrypt)
- **Backed up** regularly to prevent data loss

We retain your data as long as your account is active.
privacy.section_5_content:
In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:

- **Access** your personal data
- **Rectify** incorrect information
- **Delete** your account and all your data
- **Export** your data (portability)
- **Object** to the processing of your data
- **Limit** the processing of your data

**How to delete your account:**
- Directly via **Settings ‚Üí Delete my account**
- Or by revoking access via Facebook (automatic deletion)

**What gets permanently deleted:**
Your account, personal dictionary, lesson progress, XP statistics, exercise results, completed courses, goals and achievements. This action is immediate and irreversible.

For other rights, contact us at: **contact@linguami.com**
privacy.section_6_content:
We use cookies for:

- **Session**: Maintain your connection
- **Preferences**: Save your choices (dark/light theme, interface language)
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics to improve the site (anonymized)

You can disable cookies in your browser, but some features may no longer work.
privacy.section_7_content:
We only share your data with:

- **Supabase**: Database hosting (GDPR compliant)
- **Cloudflare**: CDN for media files (GDPR compliant)
- **Google Analytics**: Anonymized statistics

We **never** share your data with advertisers or data brokers.
privacy.section_8_content:
Linguami is accessible to users **13 years and older**.

If you are under 16 (legal age in the EU), parental or legal guardian consent is required. We do not knowingly collect data on children under 13.
privacy.section_9_content:
We may modify this privacy policy. Important changes will be notified by:

- Email to your registered address
- Notification on the platform
- Update of the "Last updated" date below

Continued use of Linguami after modification implies acceptance of the new terms.
privacy.section_10_content:
For any questions regarding this policy:

**Email:** contact@linguami.com
**Data Protection Officer:** Linguami

We are committed to responding within **30 days** in accordance with GDPR.
privacy.cta_subtitle: We are here to help and answer all your concerns
privacy.footer_link: See also our Terms of Service ‚Üí

teacher.description: Learn Russian or French with certified native teachers. Personalized remote lessons adapted to your level and goals with experienced instructors.
teacher.subtitleRussian: Alliance Fran√ßaise teacher, graduate of Moscow University
teacher.subtitleFrench: French teacher for foreigners, graduate of Alliance Fran√ßaise
teacher.textRussian: Natacha is passionate about learning and teaching languages. She will guide you through your Russian learning journey with personalized coaching. Russian can be challenging, but it becomes much easier with an attentive teacher who understands your difficulties and follows the right methodology. Thanks to her experience with international students, she is familiar with the challenges that Russian learners face. She also speaks English, which allows her to accommodate English-speaking students. Natacha is the main content creator of this site.
teacher.textFrench: Sidney is passionate about learning and teaching languages. He will guide you through your French learning journey with personalized coaching. French can be challenging, but it becomes much easier with an attentive teacher who understands your difficulties and follows the right methodology. Thanks to his experience with international students, he is familiar with the challenges that French learners face. He also speaks English, which allows him to accommodate English-speaking students. Sidney is the developer of this site.
